attributes.action: provide heating allowance for disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Disabled people need to keep warm as much as old people some times even more, as a lot of old people spend less time in there homes due to being fit another to go out to clubs day centers etc.
I'm not saying give every disabled person the same as the heating allowance pensioners get. say some one who gets middle rate D.L.A would get one amount, and some one who gets D.L.A at high rate  would get more money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
